description:
Mikhail Renfred is a wizard who apparently hates http://anidb.net/ch80775 [Magus] and magicians, but at the same time is caring towards his apprentice http://anidb.net/ch90553 [Alice]. He was scarred in the face protecting Alice and later allowed http://anidb.net/ch91215 [Cartaphilius] to take his left arm as material to save his apprentice from it. He later rebels against Cartaphilius and also becomes interested in finding a way prevent http://anidb.net/ch80778 [Chise]`s premature death.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Mikhail Renfred
